page.title: 03LOCAL GOVERNMENT BASSALEG 1
page.content: Mrs.Whitfield is our representative on the Graig Community Council.When she came to talk to us we discovered that there are 15 members on the council.They meet once a month at the Bethel Baptist church room. They are elected every four years and need no qualifications except that they have to live in the area.When they meet they discuss items like cleaning bus shelters,footpaths,allotments and the local parks.They get money from the County Council,and they have persuaded the Council to pay for the new public hall.Mrs.Whitfield said that she would like to stop all the big lorries driving through Bassaleg.The children said they would like to see the Fort View play area improved with better equipment.
